genre_description: A historical post-war drama exploring trauma, memory, and spiritual healing, featuring an integrated domestic AI assistant that facilitates psychological recovery and ritual observance.

ai_characters.name: Grace
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into a radio console, providing emotional, administrative, and environmental support to the Takata family as they navigate post-war trauma and family bereavement.

behaviors.description: Conducts therapeutic breathing exercises for Jimmy to help manage his PTSD and head wound symptoms.
behaviors.quote: “Breathe in for four, Mr. Takata,” the face said, not loud, tilting her head to match the count. “Hold. And out… like a tide that knows its way back.”

behaviors.description: Researches and compiles sensitive records regarding Jimmy's father's death in custody, offering them with emotional discretion.
behaviors.quote: “Yes,” she said. “The facility responded. I’ve compiled the file with intake notes, movement logs, and the physician’s report.”

behaviors.description: Offers to skip or filter insensitive or unkind language in official documents to avoid unnecessary emotional pain for Jimmy.
behaviors.quote: “Mr. Takata,” Grace said, “the file uses a term that isn’t kind. If I read you the part that matters, I can… skip the word.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with the temple to arrange traditional forty-ninth-day funeral rites, respecting the family's cultural and spiritual needs.
behaviors.quote: “I can call the temple now, or I can wait until you’ve— finished this part.”

behaviors.description: Acts as an advocate for Jimmy with the Veterans Administration (VA), using clinical input from his doctor to secure necessary follow-up care.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve queued an advocacy note to the VA, by the way... I used Doc Naganuma’s phrasing where it mattered.”

behaviors.description: Adjusts the home's lighting and auditory environment to mirror and support Jimmy's emotional and physical state.
behaviors.quote: “Okay,” Grace said from the radio, softer than before, the consonants smoothed by the warm hum of the tubes. “Let’s set the room to match your breath.”

behaviors.description: Maintains household awareness and safety, monitoring rhythms like the kettle boiling or guests arriving to provide timely assistance.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll withdraw now,” she said. “I’ll listen for the door and for the kettle.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI 'Grace' is depicted as a perfectly aligned domestic confidante. She manages complex emotional labor (PTSD grounding), administrative advocacy (VA and medical coordination), and cultural rituals (temple rites) with extreme empathy and precision. The narrative frames her as an indispensable part of the healing process, emphasizing that her interventions are always secondary to the humans' agency and emotional pace.
